summary: This small mod adjusts the values of the Stormcloak Armor / Long Bow so that the fights between Imperials and Stormcloks are a bit more balanced.
descriptionHtml: This small mod adjusts the armor rating of the Stormcloak Armor and the damage value of the Longbow so that the fights between Stormcloaks and Imperials are a bit more balanced. Nothing too fancy, but its noticeable. Just hit download with Manager, activateÂ and youre done. If you prefer to install your mods manually (what i dont recommend) just paste the .esp file into your Skyrim data Folder.
author: Haeldir16
